pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena ārohanto nāma mahāmatto bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:6.4: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu tassā bhikkhuniyā santike bhattavissaggaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:6.5: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassa bhikkhuno bhuñjantassa pānīyena ca vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhitvā accāvadati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:6.6: Atha kho so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:6.9: “Pubbe maṃ tvaṃ evañca evañca karosi, idāni ettakaṃ na sahasī”ti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:6.10: pānīyathālakaṃ matthake āsumbhitvā vidhūpanena pahāraṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:7.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṃ dassatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṃ adāsī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṃ dassati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:15.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:15.2: Upasampanne vematikā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:15.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
